description:
DAIRY CAUSES INFLAMMATION.... RIGHT?⁣
....⁣
WELL... NO, THATS NOT ACCURATE ⁣
⁣
Follow @antidiet_dietitian 💜⁣
⁣
Nowaydays we hear about ""Anti-inflammatory diets"" & so many people blaming and putting milk/dairy in the pro inflammatory category... ⁣
⁣
For many, milk comes to mind as something to eliminate but HOLD it THERE! ⁣
⁣
It has been proven over and over, that milk has actually anti inflammatory effects on health markers, and there is still so much emerging evidence coming our way!!!
⁣
Why would you want to eliminate an anti-inflammatory food ?
⁣
 In various systematic reviews & meta analysis dairy has been shown to have NO SIGNIFICANT EFFECT ON INFLAMMATORY MARKERS in the body and has actually been found to have a significant anti-inflammatory effect in certain populations!⁣
⁣
Obviously If you suffer from milk allergy, then milk is not an option for you ⁣
⁣
So why is it that people want to eliminate dairy? ⁣
⁣
It seems to get a bad reputation due to its saturated fat content.  And we all know saturated  fat has been linked to potentially cause inflammation (however this topic is also under review) ⁣
⁣
When you read through systematic  reviews though, all dairy products including full fat versions of dairy have very similar anti-inflammatory effects.⁣
⁣
These results could be due to a variety of reasons.  Some studies have reported the existence of over 400 different types of fat in milk with varying fatty acid chain lengths & saturation levels which may likely result in different effects on inflammatory markers.⁣
⁣
Also, if you think about it...there are plenty of fermented dairy products (I .e. greek yogurt) that promote serve as probiotics & promote healthy gut bacteria, so this has an effect on ⬇️total inflammation in the body⁣
⁣
People buy into these MARKETING STRATEGIES on “REDUCING INFLAMMATION IS KEY""⁣
... However,  inflammation is not necessarily a bad thing (only when we refer to chronic inflammation). This is a natural body process to help with healing.. so some inflammation is a good sign.⁣
⁣
Most healthy people arent living their lives in an inflamed status 
STOP FEARING DAIRY OR MILK

SHARE🙏💜
